function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in consumer confidence leading to reduced expenditures","Impact":"Decreased economic activity and retail trade, potential downsizing by businesses","Mitigation":"Implement policies to boost consumer confidence, provide financial support for businesses, incentivize spending on essential items","Technologies":"Economic forecasting models, financial aid programs, marketing and advertising campaigns","People":"Consumers, businesses","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, businesses"},{"Description":"Decline in industrial production and retail sales","Impact":"Decreased economic output, impact on unemployment, reduced consumer spending","Mitigation":"Invest in infrastructure, support local manufacturing, and provide financial assistance to industries","Technologies":"Automation, supply chain management systems, economic stimulus programs","People":"Workers, manufacturers, businesses","Owner":"Government, industry associations, employers"},{"Description":"Drop in credit card expenditures","Impact":"Indicator of decreased economic activity, impact on banking sector performance","Mitigation":"Encourage responsible spending, provide financial literacy education, and support digital payment solutions","Technologies":"Digital payment platforms, financial education apps, data analytics for spending behavior","People":"Consumers, banks","Owner":"Financial institutions, government, financial technology companies"}]}
